name: Arcane Tower
description:
Evil reigns throughout the kingdom, darkness obscures the landscape. A brave wizard is determined to put an end to all of this. But there's only one way. The Arcane Tower keeps the powers and secrets required to defeat all the evil.

Arcane Tower is a roguelike game with mechanics carefully designed to make every run challenging, interesting and incredibly fun.

Key features:

* Maps are randomly generated, meaning every run you play will be different from every other run you've played.
* Daily Challenge! Every day a special map is generated, the same for everyone in the world. Compete in the daily leaderboards!
* Watch other players: after playing a Daily Challenge, you can watch replays of the top players to see how they got their score.
